verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-advaita, jaya nityānanda
jaya jaya mahāprabhura sarva-bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-advaita—unto Śrī Advaita Ācārya; jaya—all glories; nityānanda—unto Lord Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu; jaya jaya—all glories; mahāprabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sarva—all; bhakta-vṛnda—devotees.
translation: All glories to Śrī Advaita Prabhu, Nityānanda Prabhu and all the devotees of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu!
